FuncDef: The display multicast-vlan vlan command displays information about multicast VLANs.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about a specified multicast VLAN.
If vlan-id is not specified, information about all multicast VLANs will be displayed.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the multicast VLAN function is configured, the display multicast-vlan vlan command can be used to display information about multicast VLANs.
